name: Road Switchler
description:
Road Switchler is Super Addictive game, which Simple Graphic and Simple Gameplay this game is very fun. It's amazing Game.

Enjoy this game with Up To 105 Level and also with new features, that is Choose Character which you can choose 10 Different Character in this game. Beat your New High score, Buy new Character and Share to your friends.

Enjoy The Game as Much as you can. And also this game is Super Addictive.

Features:
=======
- Universal Game.
- Endless Game.
- Share Your Score In Social Media.
- Fun Game just 1 Tap Play.
- Up To 105 Level.
- Multiple Character Select (10 Character).
- Ultimate Sound withSound on/Off Option.

It's amazing Addictive Game. So are you ready bit me..
Play and Enjoy.

Don't forget review us!!!
